tweet.html: RT @NixonLibrary: #NixonInChina #OTD 2/21/1972 Later that afternoon, President Nixon and Premier Chou motored to the residence of Chairman Mao Zedong in the Zhongnanhai compound of the former Imperial City in Beijing. Read the transcript of their historic meeting online: history.state.gov/historicaldocu…
